column4: Microsoft says security patches slowing down PCs  servers
column5: Microsoft Corp  said on Tuesday that software patches released to guard against microchip security threats slowed down some personal computers and servers  with systems running on older Intel Corp  processors seeing a noticeable decrease in performance. | Video

column4: UPDATE 6-Microsoft says security patches slowing down PCs  servers
column5: Jan 9 Microsoft Corp said on Tuesday that software patches released to guard against microchip security threats slowed down some personal computers and servers  with systems running on older Intel Corp processors seeing a noticeable decrease in performance.

column4: Cloud companies consider Intel rivals after security flaws found
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Some of Intel Corp's  data center customers  whose thousands of computers run cloud networks  are exploring using microchips from the market leader's rivals to build new infrastructure after the discovery of security flaws affecting most chips.

column4: Cloud companies consider Intel rivals after security flaws found
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  Jan 10 Some of Intel Corp's data center customers  whose thousands of computers run cloud networks  are exploring using microchips from the market leader's rivals to build new infrastructure after the discovery of security flaws affecting most chips.

column4: Consumers suing Intel over chip flaws ask for consolidation of litigation
column5: Four California plaintiffs on Monday asked the Judicial Panel on Multidistrict Litigation to consolidate the growing number of lawsuits over flawed Intel Corp chips that could allow hackers to steal sensitive information from nearly every modern computing device.
